query-mapping.description: The list of posts for the blog administrator.

class.name: AWA.Blogs.Models.Admin_Post_Info
class.comment: The Admin_Post_Info describes a post in the administration interface.

property.name: read_count
property.comment: the number of times the post was read.

property.name: comment_count
property.comment: the number of comments for this post.

query.name: blog-admin-post-list
query.comment: Get the list of blog posts
query.sql: SELECT post.id, post.title, post.uri, post.create_date, post.status, post.read_count, u.name, count(cmt.id) FROM awa_blog as blog INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = blog.id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[blog-update-post] INNER JOIN awa_post AS post ON blog.id = post.blog_id INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON post.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN awa_comment AS cmt ON cmt.entity_id = post.id AND cmt.entity_type = :entity_type WHERE blog.id = :blog_id GROUP BY post.id, u.id ORDER BY post.create_date DESC

query.name: blog-admin-post-list-date
query.comment: Get the list of blog posts
query.sql: SELECT post.id, post.title, post.uri, post.create_date, post.status, post.read_count, u.name, count(cmt.id) FROM awa_blog as blog INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = blog.id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[blog-update-post] INNER JOIN awa_post AS post ON blog.id = post.blog_id INNER JOIN awa_user AS user ON post.author_id = user.id LEFT JOIN awa_comment AS cmt ON cmt.entity_id = post.id AND cmt.entity_type = :entity_type WHERE blog.id = :blog_id AND post.publish_date >= :first_date AND post.publish_date <= :last_date GROUP BY post.id, u.id ORDER BY post.id DESC
